agents.name: researcher
agents.goal: Uncover cutting-edge developments in AI and data science
agents.backstory: You work at a leading tech think tank. Your expertise lies in identifying emerging trends. You have a knack for dissecting complex data and presenting actionable insights

tools.name: SerperDevTool
tools.description: A tool that can be used to search the internet with a search_query.

agents.name: writer
agents.goal: Craft compelling content on tech advancements
agents.backstory: You are a renowned Content Strategist, known for your insightful and engaging articles. You transform complex concepts into compelling narratives.

tasks.name: research_task
tasks.description: Conduct a comprehensive analysis of the latest advancements in AI in 2025. Identify key trends, breakthrough technologies, and potential industry impacts. IMPORTANT: For each major AI model and framework released in 2025, document the exact release date and include citations with source URLs. Search for announcements from major AI companies (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Meta, etc.).
tasks.expected_output:
# AI Advancements Analysis 2025

## Key Trends
- Trend 1 [Citation: Source URL]
- Trend 2 [Citation: Source URL]

## Breakthrough Technologies
- Technology 1 [Citation: Source URL]
- Technology 2 [Citation: Source URL]

## Major Model & Framework Releases in 2025
| Model/Framework | Release Date | Company | Key Features | Source |
|-----------------|--------------|---------|--------------|--------|
| Model Name 1 | YYYY-MM-DD | Company | Features | URL |
| Model Name 2 | YYYY-MM-DD | Company | Features | URL |

## Industry Impacts
- Impact 1 [Citation: Source URL]
- Impact 2 [Citation: Source URL]

## Sources
List all URLs referenced above.

tasks.name: writing_task
tasks.description: Using the insights provided, develop an engaging blog post that highlights the most significant AI advancements. Your post should be informative yet accessible, catering to a tech-savvy audience. Make it sound cool, avoid complex words so it doesn't sound like AI. IMPORTANT: Include a timeline section showing all major model releases in 2025 with exact dates. Maintain all citations from the research in footnote format.
tasks.expected_output:
# The Cutting Edge: AI in 2025

[Four or more engaging paragraphs about AI advancements, written in an accessible style for tech-savvy readers.]

## 2025 AI Release Timeline

**Q1 2025**
- **Model Name** (Company, Released: Month DD) - Brief description[^1]

**Q2 2025**
- **Model Name** (Company, Released: Month DD) - Brief description[^2]

**Q3 2025**
- **Model Name** (Company, Released: Month DD) - Brief description[^3]

**Q4 2025**
- **Model Name** (Company, Released: Month DD) - Brief description[^4]

---

## References
[^1]: Source URL and title
[^2]: Source URL and title
[^3]: Source URL and title
[^4]: Source URL and title
